```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr) # for data cleaning
```

```{r}
# Load in data set
registrants <- read.csv("Registrants.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# drop columns that we aren't using; assign new variable
registrants <-select(registrants, -c(P_CLIENTCODE, Client.ID))
```

```{r}
# Date is character and registrants is an integer
head(registrants)
```

```{r}
# view the structure of the data
str(registrants)
```
```{r}
summary(registrants$REGISTRANTS)
```
